  • Constructor Details

    • FlatTypeDetails

      public FlatTypeDetails(int totalUnits, int availableUnits, double sellingPrice)
      Constructor for FlatTypeDetails.
      Parameters:
      totalUnits - The total number of units available for this flat type
      availableUnits - The number of units currently available for sale
      sellingPrice - The selling price of the flat type
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any of the parameters are invalid

  • Method Details

    • getTotalUnits

      public int getTotalUnits()
      Gets the total number of units for this flat type.
      Returns:
      The total unit count.

    • getAvailableUnits

      public int getAvailableUnits()
      Gets the number of available units for this flat type.
      Returns:
      The available unit count.

    • getSellingPrice

      public double getSellingPrice()
      Gets the selling price of this flat type.
      Returns:
      The selling price.

    • setSellingPrice

      public void setSellingPrice(double sellingPrice)
      Sets the selling price of this flat type.
      Parameters:
      sellingPrice - The new selling price.

    • decrementAvailableUnits

      public boolean decrementAvailableUnits()
      Decrements the number of available units by one.
      Returns:
      true if the decrement was successful, false if no units were available to decrement.

    • incrementAvailableUnits

      public boolean incrementAvailableUnits()
      Increments the number of available units by one.
      Returns:
      true if the increment was successful, false if it would exceed total units.

    • setAvailableUnits

      public void setAvailableUnits(int availableUnits)
      Sets the number of available units for this flat type.
      Parameters:
      availableUnits - The new number of available units.
